name: Duel Barista Ninjas
description:
Two rival ninjas run into another on a bad morning, what could go wrong?

Face off against another player on multiple stages as caffeine energises your abilities to absurdity.

Developed within 64x64 resolution for the LowRezJam 2022.

Play with Keyboard and Mouse. 

Player 1:

  • WASD = Movement
  • T or Left-Click = Attack

Player 2:

  • Arrows = Movement
  • L or Right-Click = Attack

Support for gamepad and AI player to be included in the future.

Sourced Assets:

  • Fantasy Skybox FREE 1.4.0 - Gold Experience Team
